thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-AbbVie Gets Positive Recommendation From Pan-Canadian Oncology Drug Review For Venclexta

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-AbbVie Gets Positive Recommendation From Pan-Canadian Oncology Drug Review For Venclexta
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - AbbVie Inc:
* ABBVIE RECEIVES POSITIVE RECOMMENDATION FROM THE PAN-CANADIAN ONCOLOGY DRUG REVIEW FOR VENCLEXTA™ - AN ORAL THERAPY FOR THE TREATMENT OF PATIENTS WITH CHRONIC LYMPHOCYTIC LEUKEMIA (CLL)
* ABBVIE CANADA - PCODR CONDITIONALLY RECOMMENDS REIMBURSEMENT OF VENCLEXTA FOR CLL PATIENTS WHO HAVE RECEIVED AT LEAST 1 PRIOR THERAPY & FAILED A BCRI​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
